alert.note: Alert for Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 4:01PM CDT until June 21 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MENARD COUNTY... At 401 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over The Intersection Of Us-83 And Highway 29, or over Menard, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Menard, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1773, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Highway 29 and Us-83 Near The Kimble-Menard County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
